5b67d980ae4c3c82251106e26913ce67 (18:01): I select the checkbox [ ] Log this channel

906cca2a5ed603c0f4e8b08b56a80768 (18:01): oh and you just permanently hang out here?

5b67d980ae4c3c82251106e26913ce67 (18:02): And when a bus drives by sometimes the connection drops
5b67d980ae4c3c82251106e26913ce67 (18:02): It's like HTML, ugly bit it works
